page.title: 04HOMELIFE
page.content: School and work fill most of five days of the week,but a two day weekend leaves times for hobbies and non-work activities.Gardening is a high priority for the villagers.Cricket is popular in the summer months;a few homes have private swimming pools and tennis courts,but the nearest public ones are in Tewkesbury.Other hobbies include: Scottish country dancing.Gliding Sailing. Snooker Horse riding. Book binding Evening classes during winter months run by Gloucester LEA. Cheltenham and Stratford are the nearest towns to provide theatres, cinemas and museums. The mobile library visits every second week. Families usually eat only the evening meal together which is prepared by mother with help from children.
